document.full_text: coach john dunne has taken st. peter's to the maac tournament title for the first time since 1995, and a berth in the n.c.a.a. tournament.
document.title: coach stayed home, and st. peter's is glad he did
lines_and_colors: coach john dunne has taken st. peter's to the maac tournament title for the first time since 1995, and a berth in the n.c.a.a. tournament.
